pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video showcases a sterile, minimalist architectural space. The camera moves forward from a narrow, white-tiled corridor, up a short flight of stairs, and through a doorway. This reveals a larger room with a central, shallow, square pool that has a black and white design on its floor, reflecting the ceiling lights.
